entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
